name: Find Yourself (itch) (José Moreira Castanheira)
description:
In this Underwater world, we meet a little fish without a true sense of self. It will need to change form multiple times until, finally, it finds itself. Will our little fella make it ?

Explore the depths of the ocean and move forward to find your past and know your future.

Credits: 

Production:
Beatriz Avelino (Game Design / Level Design)
Frederico Resende (Character art / Animation)
Guilherme Batista (2D Art / Environment art)
José Castanheira (Programming / Game Design)

Special Thanks:
Phool Prado (Music)
